name: Rumble (Atari 520 ST)
description:
Back in 1991 while learning 68000 I created Rumble with a could of friends.  This was my second completed game for the Atari ST and includes a Quartet music intro, two player simultaneous action over many unique levels.  The game is in the style of Boulderdash with it's own twist.

To play, insert the virtual disk in an Atari STFM emulator and from the GEM Desktop, double click the RUMBLE.TOS file to load the game.
